summary: Just a stand-alone weapon. Eskrima Sticks. 2k textures
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=yellow]UPDATE v2[/color][/b]
-Added bone crushing sounds
-Applied different impact data sets to fit more appropriately
-Created all new meshes and reapplied textures
-Increased striking speed to fit that of the Stick
-Raised critical dmg multiplier
-Plethora of other minor tweaks

Here\'s a vid of it in action. Both FPP and TPP
www.youtube.com/watch?v=r1vy21dX7cM&feature=plcp


That\'s just it............ A craftable, temperable and enchantable Eskrima stick with hi-res 2k textures. Bop  some milk drinkers in the moo moo.

Craft at any forge under the Steel category (i\'ll move to Misc soon when I can find some open-source wood clanking audio files for collisions).

Install with NMM or extract into skyrim data folder

Dedicated to my younger bro whom is studying with these weapons.

**Update 1.7 used**
***Feel free to rip it apart and use anything, anywhere, any how you like!
author: n1x4
